thread.section_title: Citadines Bastille Gare de Lyon Paris - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Friendly and Helpful Staff
thread.title_full: Friendly and Helpful Staff - Review of Citadines Bastille Gare de Lyon Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Miclst
title: Friendly and Helpful Staff
text: The hotel rooms are spacious and equipped with all necessities. Location was good with several eateries around. The metro station is just around the corner from the hotel. Staff were friendly and helpful, providing us with useful information on getting around the city. They even reminded us to be mindful of pickpockets when walking on the streets.
